experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
• Worked on developing the Simli Studio for avatar management and creation using NextJS and tailwind.
• Designed and implemented a scalable infrastructure on Google Compute Engine, incorporating load balancing to support 100+ concurrent users, ensuring system reliability and scalability using python and Traefik.
• Integrated FAISS vector database for efficient caching of text, audio, and video, resulting in a 30% cache hit rate and significantly reducing roundtrip latency in Python
• Automated client engagement processes by creating cron jobs using Firebase Functions, leading to a 20% reduction in manual intervention for client interactions.
• Developed automation scripts for email and SMS notifications, streamlining invoice issuance and improving client reminder workflows.
• Led Android and iOS app development with Flutter, increasing accessibility and engagement.
• Implemented various endpoints in FastAPI, including streaming with HLS and ffmpeg.

experiences.title: Senior Mobile Engineer
experiences.description:
• Spearheaded the development of a carrier app for long-haul drivers, utilized by 150+ drivers, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience as the sole developer.
• Migrated REST APIs to GraphQL for client-facing Flutter apps, improving data retrieval efficiency and enabling more flexible client-side queries
• Integrated WhatsApp Cloud API to automate messaging for over 2,000 clients, significantly enhancing customer communication and reducing manual effort
• Designed and implemented Flutter applications for ground crew truck drivers, enabling improved real-time communication and coordination, boosting operational efficiency
• Developed webapps for internal sales management using NextJS
